item.title: NBA: Losing scoring title to LeBron will be a ‘bitter pill’ for Kareem, says Magic
item.description: NBA: Losing scoring title to LeBron will be a ‘bitter pill’ for Kareem, says Magic Los Angeles Lakers forward LeBron James (6) drives to the basket during the fourth quarter against the Portland Trail Blazers at Crypto.

item.title: US health body rules collision sports cause CTE in landmark change
item.description: US health body rules collision sports cause CTE in landmark change US National Institutes of Health acknowledge causal linkConcussion in Sport Group conference takes place this weekIn a move that will have ramifications for collision sports, the US National Institutes of Health has formally acknowledged a causal link between repeated blows to the head and the neurodegenerative disease chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE).

item.title: Southampton v Arsenal: Premier League – live
item.description: Southampton v Arsenal: Premier League – live Match at St Mary’s kicks off at 2pm BSTGet in touch with Gregg via email or on TwitterThe teams are out at St Mary’s on what has ended up being a lovely day for football after the torrential showers earlier.
